snippet.title: Hazbin Hotel - Gravity (Epic Metal Cover by SoniKhaos)
snippet.description:
Hello everyone,

After revisiting Hazbin Hotel's first season, I knew I had to dive into the new material. Gravity hit differently - there's something raw and powerful in this song that demanded a metal treatment.

If you're familiar with the original, you'll find it interesting to compare how we transformed it. This is what we live for as musicians - finding that perfect storm where the original's emotion meets our sound, and everything just clicks. Patrick and I pushed each other hard on this one, and you can hear it in every riff and every note.

Some songs just need to be covered. This was one of them.

Credits:
Vocals, Mixing & Mastering - Siegfried Song
Lead Guitar, Rhythm Guitar & Arrangement - Patrick Fallang

Please support with likes, subscriptions, and comments!
What's your favorite part of this metal version? Let me know!

#HazbinHotel #Gravity #MetalCover #VivziePop #Season2 #Lute #Adam
